CustomField.description: This is a copy of the Primary Constituent's Email Opt-Out preference. If you want to amend it, do it on the constituent's detail page. Updating that field will update this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a copy of the Primary Constituent's Email Opt-Out preference. If you want to amend it, do it on the constituent's detail page. Updating that field will update this field.
CustomField.label: Email Opt-out
